name: lumax/form-component
description: The form component for the Luma framework

scripts.test: php -d xdebug.mode=coverage ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox --colors=always --coverage-html coverage --coverage-clover coverage/coverage.xml --testdox-html coverage/testdox.html && npx badger --phpunit ./coverage/coverage.xml && npx badger --version ./composer.json && npx badger --license ./composer.json
